remarks: Characterize the subgroups of a group by closure properties. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Dec-2014.)
statement:
issubg2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
issubg2.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
issubg2.i $e |- I = ( invg ` G ) $.
issubg2 $p |- ( G e. Grp -> ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) <-> ( S C_ B /\ S =/= (/) /\ A. x e. S ( A. y e. S ( x .+ y ) e. S /\ ( I ` x ) e. S ) ) ) ) $.
$d .+ x y $.
$d G x y $.
$d I x y $.
$d S x y $.
